welcome_message: Hi! Ask me about our services, pricing, timeline, or how to start.

intents.reply: We provide custom websites, web/mobile apps, API integration, cloud solutions, and AI chatbot development.
Pricing depends on project scope and timeline. Share your requirement and we can provide a custom estimate quickly.
Typical delivery ranges from 1-2 weeks for small sites to 6-12 weeks for complex apps.
You can contact us using the form on this page or email connect@geektakneek.com.
Yes, we build AI chatbots and integrate them with websites, apps, and business workflows.
Hello! Tell me what you want to build and I can guide you with the next steps.

faq.question: Do you build e-commerce websites?
faq.answer: Yes. We build secure, fast, and scalable e-commerce websites with payment gateway integration.

faq.question: Do you provide API development and integration?
faq.answer: Yes. We develop custom APIs and integrate third-party services like payments, CRM, and cloud tools.

faq.question: Do you provide cloud services?
faq.answer: Yes. We support cloud migration, deployment, microservices architecture, and serverless solutions.

faq.question: Can you redesign an existing website?
faq.answer: Yes. We can redesign your existing website with better UI, performance, and conversion-focused structure.

fallback_responses: Thanks for your message. Please share your project type, budget, and timeline so we can guide you better.
I can help with websites, apps, APIs, cloud, and AI chatbot solutions. What are you planning to build?
I did not fully catch that. You can ask about services, pricing, timelines, or contact details.
